quote_last: a policeman observed the place in darkness, but with the stranger's motor still at the curb.
title: The Shadow Out of Time
author: H.P. Lovecraft

quote_first: It did. When the alarm rang at
quote_last: , Lew shut it off, snapped on the little bedside lamp, then swung his feet to the floor to sit on the edge of the bed, holding his eyes open.
title: The Night People
author: Jack Finney
